snippet: A lawyer writes that many people don’t realize that the laws of half of the states were not affected by the Supreme Court’s campaign finance ruling.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer writes that many people don’t realize that the laws of half of the states were not affected by the Supreme Court’s campaign finance ruling.

headline.main: Misconceptions About the Citizens United Ruling

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
